00052   const char *usage[] = {
00053     "usage: rsdump [options]",
00054     "",
00055     "  options:",
00056     "    --config=<file>  Read configuration from <file>.  The default config file",
00057     "                     is \"conf/hypertable.cfg\" relative to the toplevel",
00058     "                     install directory",
00059     "    --host=<name>    Connect to the server running on host <name>",
00060     "    --port=<n>       Connect to the server running on port <n>",
00061     "    --help           Display this help text and exit",
00062     "    --verbose,-v     Display 'true' if up, 'false' otherwise",
00063     "",
00064     "  This program instructs the range server to dump out status to it's log.",
00065     "",
00066     (const char *)0
00067   };

00075 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00076   string configFile = "";
00077   string hostName = "";
00078   int port = 0;
00079   PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00080   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00081   const char *hostProperty = 0;
00082   const char *portProperty = 0;
00083   const char *portStr = 0;
00084   Comm *comm = 0;
00085   ConnectionManagerPtr connManagerPtr;
00086   Hyperspace::SessionPtr hyperspacePtr;
00087   RangeServerClient *rangeServer;
00088   ApplicationQueuePtr appQueuePtr;
00089   bool verbose = false;
00090 
00091   System::initialize(argv[0]);
00092   ReactorFactory::initialize((uint16_t)System::get_processor_count());
00093 
00094   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00095     if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--config=", 9))
00096       configFile = &argv[i][9];
00097     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--host=", 7))
00098       hostName = &argv[i][7];
00099     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--port=", 7))
00100       portStr = &argv[i][7];
00101     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-v"))
00102       verbose = true;
00103     else
00104       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00105   }
00106 
00107   if (configFile == "")
00108     configFile = System::installDir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00109 
00110   props_ptr = new Properties(configFile);
00111 
00112   if (hostName == "")
00113     hostName = "localhost";
00114   portProperty = "Hypertable.RangeServer.Port";
00115 
00116   {
00117     if (hostName == "")
00118       hostName = props_ptr->get(hostProperty, "localhost");
00119     
00120     if (portStr != 0)
00121       props_ptr->set(portProperty, portStr);
00122 
00123     port = props_ptr->get_int(portProperty, 0);
00124     if (port == 0 || port < 1024 || port >= 65536) {
00125       HT_ERRORF("%s not specified or out of range : %d", portProperty, port);
00126       return 1;
00127     }
00128 
00129     if (!InetAddr::initialize(&addr, hostName.c_str(), (uint16_t)port))
00130       goto abort;
00131   }
00132 
00133   props_ptr->set("silent", "true");
00134 
00135   comm = new Comm();
00136   connManagerPtr = new ConnectionManager(comm);
00137 
00138   //connManagerPtr->set_quiet_mode(true);
00139 
00140   connManagerPtr->add(addr, 30, "Range Server");
00141   if (!connManagerPtr->wait_for_connection(addr, 2))
00142     goto abort;
00143   rangeServer = new RangeServerClient(comm, 30);
00144   rangeServer->dump_stats(addr);
00145 
00146   return 0;
00147 
00148  abort:
00149   return 1;
00150 }
